title: [MAJOR] [GAMEPLAY] Zyra's Rise of The Thorns Bug
body:
Whenever your passive pops as Zyra, Rise of the Thorns, all actives become disabled except one. Oracle Lens, the Altered Sweeper, can be activated, which ends your passive prematurely without shooting a thorn out at all.

Repro:
1.) Die as Zyra
2.) Activate Oracle Lens
3.) Rise of the Thorns ends prematurely, without shooting a thorn out

Riot KateyKhaos pls =(

replies.body:
Hey Frozen Sovereign, (I almost didn't recognize you with the name change :P)

Thanks for the report! (Yay for repro steps!)

I caught up with champion team, and they're aware of the issue and are looking into it. For a bit more context, we don't consider this a major issue, as the combination of playing Zyra, activating passive and then using a sweeper isn't a super common case.

Shouldn't be asking for KateyKhaos specifically as she works on skins I believe. But yes reporting bugs is good. And if she is the one who reads this she will forward it to the correct team as I'm sure any other Rioter would. Just know that KateyKhaos isn't on the gameplay team.
I realize and am aware. I just see her in the bugs section much more often, reporting and forwarding. :)
